channel.title: Raybo.org
channel.description: Learn full-stack developer skills with a clear, practical style.

item.title: Want to get hired? Look into this technology career...LinkedIn Jobs Report finds
item.description: The LinkedIn U.S. Emerging Jobs Report Jobs Report finds that job growth in the next decade outstrips growth in the previous decade creating 11.5 million jobs, estimating that 65% of children entering primary school will hold jobs that don't yet exist.

item.title: Tooling with NPM Scripts...is it worth it?
item.description: Running Scripts and Builds using the Node Package Manager's Script functionality is become more and more popular these days, but it it the best approach?

item.title: Looking to Microsoft Ignite...A first time attendee's journey to find out what's awesome!
item.description: I find myself working for Microsoft at LinkedIn Learning in my very first Microsoft conference...Ignite. Needless to say, I feel a bit like a fish out of water, really more like a cat that's been adopted by a giraffe family. Here's what I'll be looking for during the week.

item.title: Three things I learned from six years as a teacher on Lynda.com
item.description: I find myself working for Microsoft at LinkedIn Learning in my very first Microsoft conference...Ignite. Needless to say, I feel a bit like a fish out of water, really more like a cat that's been adopted by a giraffe family. Here's what I'll be looking for during the week.

item.title: Crafting an effective video embed campaign for the LinkedIn Publishing Platform
item.description: Recently I launched a campaign promoting our serial content for LinkedIn learning which attained a large number of plays, shares and clickthroughs, so I wanted to share some of the things that worked well within our publishing platform.

item.title: Nine Weekly Series to help you master 3-D and Animation technologies
item.description: If you're an animation, 3D or VR professional looking to improve your skills, take a look at these quick, 10 minute weekly series from LinkedIn Learning experts to help you master new technologies from Maya, Blender, Z-Brush, Sketchup, BIM, Rhino and Revit.

item.title: Keep up with the fast changing front end, full stack, UX, web design and mobile industries with these seven online weekly series
item.description: These weekly series offer quick, 10 minute tips to help you stay frosty and challenge you to keep learning about Android development, web media, mastering interview code, CSS, Sharepoint, UX and Visual Studio.

item.title: Get challenged by these professional photographers, motion experts and videographers through weekly, 10 minute video courses
item.description: Check out these short, weekly, 10 minute series of courses that can help you keep up with the latest and challenge you to practice your skills. You'll learn about photo gear, get inspired by critiques, learn from practicing professional photographers, learn about the latest tools, mobile photography, Final Cut Pro, motion graphics and Nuke.

item.title: Five weekly series to help you work smarter and be more effective in your career
item.description: In order to get ahead , you need to learn to be more effective at work. Every week, these great authors give you quick, 10 minute tips to help you train your staff, understand business finance, learn to develop and manage yourself, build better work relationships and learn marketing tips to make your promotion efforts more effective.

item.title: These 10 minute weekly courses can help you become a better artist and designer
item.description: If you've been looking to improve your drawing, design, layout and photo editing skills, but keep a busy schedule, then these weekly series can help. They release once a week and include short, actionable tips and techniques from world class authors.
